GSP30anuttaru:0: saṃkrāmo 'tra na bhāvanā na ca kathāyuktir na carcā na ca
GSP30anuttaru:1: dhyānaṃ vā na ca dhāraṇā na ca japābhyāsaprayāso na ca |
GSP30anuttaru:2: tat kiṃ nāma suniścitaṃ vada paraṃ satyaṃ ca tacchrūyatāṃ na tyāgī na parigrahī bhaja sukhaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvasthitaḥ || 1 ||
GSP30anuttaru:3: saṃsāro 'sti na tattvatas tanubhṛtāṃ bandhasya vārtaiva kā
GSP30anuttaru:4: bandho yasya na jātu tasya vitathā muktasya muktikriyā |
GSP30anuttaru:5: mithyāmohakṛd eṣa rajjubhujagacchāyāpiśācabhramo mā kiṃcit tyaja mā gṛhāṇa vihara [1] svastho yathāvasthitaḥ || 2 ||
GSP30anuttaru:6: pūjapūjakapūjyabhedasaraṇiḥ keyaṃ kathānuttare saṃkrāmaḥ kila kasya kena vidadhe ko vā praveśakramaḥ
GSP30anuttaru:7: māyeyam na cidadvayāt paratayā bhinnāpy aho vartate sarvaṃ svānubhavasvabhāvavimalaṃ cintāṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ || 3 ||
GSP30anuttaru:10: harṣaḥ saṃbhṛtabhedamuktisukhabhūr bhārāvatāropamaḥ sarvādvaitapadasya vismṛtanidheḥ prāptiḥ prakāśodayaḥ || 4 ||
GSP30anuttaru:11: rāgadveṣasukhāsukhodayalayāhaṅkāradainyādayo ye bhāvāḥ pravibhānti viśvavapuṣo bhinnasvabhāvā na te |
GSP30anuttaru:12: vyaktiṃ paśyasi yasya yasya sahasā tattattadekātmatāsaṃvidrūpam avekṣya kiṃ na ramase tadbhāvanānirbharaḥ pūrvābhāvabhavakriyā hi sahasā bhāvāḥ sadā 'smin bhave madhyākāravikārasaṃkaravatāṃ teṣāṃ kutaḥ satyatā |
GSP30anuttaru:13: niḥsatye capale prapañcanicaye svapnabhrame peśale śaṅkātaṅkakalaṅkayuktikalanātītaḥ prabuddho bhava || 6 ||
GSP30anuttaru:14: bhāvānāṃ na samudbhavo 'sti sahajas tvadbhāvitā bhānty amī niḥsatyā api satyatām anubhavabhrāntyā bhajanti kṣaṇam |
GSP30anuttaru:15: tvatsaṅkalpaja eṣa viśvamahimā nāsty asya janmānyataḥ tasmāt tvaṃ vibhavena bhāsi bhuvaneṣv ekopy anekātmakaḥ || 7 ||
GSP30anuttaru:16: yat satyaṃ yad asatyam alpabahulaṃ nityaṃ na nityaṃ ca yat yan māyāmalinaṃ yad ātmavimalaṃ ciddarpaṇe rājate |
GSP30anuttaru:17: tat sarvaṃ svavimarśasaṃvidudayād rūpaprakāśātmakaṃ jñātvā svānubhavādhirūḍhamahimā viśveśvaratvaṃ bhaja || 8 ||
